name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with rich, meaty sauce.

steps.name: Cook pasta
steps.description: Boil water in a large pot, add salt, and cook spaghetti until al dente.

steps.name: Prepare sauce
steps.description: In a pan, heat olive oil, add onions and garlic, and sauté until golden. Add minced beef and cook until browned. Add canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.

steps.name: Combine
steps.description: Mix the cooked spaghetti with the sauce and serve hot.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A healthy salad with grilled chicken and Caesar dressing.

steps.name: Grill chicken
steps.description: Season chicken breast with salt and pepper, and grill until fully cooked. Slice into strips.

steps.name: Prepare salad
steps.description: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl. Add croutons and grated parmesan cheese.

steps.name: Combine
steps.description: Add grilled chicken strips to the salad and drizzle with Caesar dressing. Toss to combine.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Delicious beef tacos with fresh toppings.

steps.name: Cook beef
steps.description: In a pan, cook ground beef with taco seasoning until fully cooked.

steps.name: Prepare toppings
steps.description: Chop lettuce and tomato, and shred cheese.

steps.name: Assemble tacos
steps.description: Fill taco shells with cooked beef and top with lettuce, cheese, tomato, and sour cream.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir fry.

steps.name: Prepare vegetables
steps.description: Chop broccoli, carrot, and bell pepper.

steps.name: Stir fry
steps.description: In a pan, heat olive oil, add garlic, and sauté for 1 minute. Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper, and cook for another 2 minutes.

steps.name: Mix ingredients
steps.description: In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt. In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter. Combine wet and dry ingredients.

steps.name: Cook pancakes
steps.description: Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. Pour batter onto the pan and cook until bubbles form on the surface. Flip and cook until golden brown.

steps.name: Prepare sandwich
steps.description: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread.

steps.name: Grill sandwich
steps.description: Heat a pan over medium heat. Place the sandwich in the pan and cook until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted.

name: Tomato Soup
description: A warm and comforting tomato soup.

steps.name: Prepare ingredients
steps.description: Chop onion and garlic.

steps.name: Cook soup
steps.description: In a pot, heat olive oil, add onion and garlic, and sauté until golden. Add canned tomatoes and vegetable broth. Simmer for 20 minutes. Blend until smooth.

steps.name: Mix ingredients
steps.description: In a bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar. Add eggs and vanilla extract. In another bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Combine wet and dry ingredients. Stir in chocolate chips.

steps.name: Bake cookies
steps.description: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful chicken curry with spices.

steps.name: Prepare ingredients
steps.description: Chop chicken, onion, and garlic.

steps.name: Cook curry
steps.description: In a pot, heat olive oil, add onion and garlic, and sauté until golden. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add curry powder and coconut milk. Simmer for 20 minutes.

name: Greek Salad
description: A refreshing Greek salad with feta cheese.

steps.name: Prepare vegetables
steps.description: Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion.

steps.name: Assemble salad
steps.description: In a bowl, combine cucumber, tomato, red onion, feta cheese, and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.
